tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE dance_choreography ( 
    choreography_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    choreography_name VARCHAR(255), 
    music_title VARCHAR(255), 
    music_artist VARCHAR(255), 
    costume_details TEXT, 
    dance_sequence TEXT 
)

CREATE TABLE choreography (
    choreography_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    choreography_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    music_id INT NOT NULL,
    costume_id INT NOT NULL,
    sequence_id INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE choreography_details (
    detail_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    music_id UUID REFERENCES music(music_id),
    costume_id UUID REFERENCES costumes(costume_id),
    sequence_id UUID REFERENCES sequences(sequence_id),
    choreographer VARCHAR(255)
);
